trend_summary: Across the image sequence the territory remains dominantly agricultural-rural. Built-up spots grow only marginally around scattered villages, while most change is in land cover: some fields consolidate, small forest blocks are cleared or re-planted, and a straighter road corridor appears. Overall settlement density stays sparse and no urban centres emerge.
notable_changes: Minor outward growth of several village clusters, mostly along existing roads.
Consolidation of irregular plots into larger rectangular cropland blocks.
Localised clearing of woodland in the southeast and centre, reducing forest cover.
Emergence or upgrade of a straighter north-south road corridor.
Small new water bodies or ponds visible near former forest patches.
